bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Illness Sign of a very uncomfortable abdominal pain with a frequent urge to defecate, and while there is a feeling of a heavy load having arrived at the anus, defecation is impossible because there is nothing left. Nan jing 難經 57: 大瘕泄者，裏急後重，數至圊 而不能便，莖中痛 , “In the case of a massive conglomeration-illness with outflow, one feels internal tension and pressure behind. One goes to the latrine frequently and is still unable to pass stools. Pain is felt in the penis”.
